name: merchant_payment_processor_agent
description: An agent that processes payments (cards, bank accounts, digital wallets) on behalf of a merchant.

extensions.description: Supports the Sample Card Network payment method extension

skills.name: Card Processor
skills.description: Processes card payments with OTP verification.

skills.name: Bank Account Processor
skills.description: Processes bank account payments with verification.

skills.name: Digital Wallet Processor
skills.description: Processes digital wallet payments (PayPal, Apple Pay).
